  "Allegations" : "[CUSTOMER] BOUGHT A IMMEDIATE INCOME ANNUITY FROM ME IN NOV. OF 2001.IN JUNE OF 2005 I RECIEVED A LETTER FROM NATIONWIDE INFORMING ME OF A COMPLAINT FROM [CUSTOMER].   "Broker Comment" : "I WASN'T AWARE OF ANY COMPLAINT UNTIL I RECIEVED A LETTER FROM NATIONWIDE IN JUNE OF 2005.I HAD SWITCHED BROKER DEALERS IN APRIL OF 2004.MY OLD BROKER/DEALER \"MAIN STREET MANAGEMENT CO.\"(MSMC) WAS BOUGHT BY LPL SHORTLY AFTER I LEFT THEM. I JOINED THE \"THE INVESTMENT CENTER INC\" IN APRIL OF 2004.MSMC WAS THE B/D WHEN I WROTE THIS CASE.I FORWARDED MY ORIGINAL RESPONSE TO NATIONWIDE.I ALSO FORWARDED MY RESPONSE TO MSMC FOR U5 AMENDMENT FILING TO BE DONE. EVIDENTLY THEY NEVER FILED THE U5 AMENDMENT SINCE THEY NO LONGER EXISTED.I WAS NOT AWARE THAT I NEEDED TO DO A U4 AMENDMENT WITH MY PRESENT B/D AS I HAD NO INFOMATION REGARDING THIS CASE UNTIL JUNE OF 2006.THAT IS WHY I AM FILING AT THIS TIME.AS FAR AS I KNOW ,THE COMPLAINT IS STILL PENDING AS I HAVE NOT RECIEVED ANY INFORMATION STATING IT WAS SETTLED."
